questionsAndAnswers.question: What is comfy-image-saver used for in ComfyUI?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: comfy-image-saver is used to save images with their generation metadata on ComfyUI, and it is compatible with Civitai & Prompthero geninfo auto-detection.
questionsAndAnswers.subject: comfy-image-saver

questionsAndAnswers.question: What file formats does comfy-image-saver support for saving images?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: comfy-image-saver supports saving images in png, jpeg, and webp formats.
questionsAndAnswers.subject: comfy-image-saver

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I install comfy-image-saver if I have ComfyUI-Manager?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can search for 'Save Image with Generation Metadata' in ComfyUI-Manager and install the custom nodes directly.
questionsAndAnswers.subject: comfy-image-saver

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do I install comfy-image-saver if I don't have ComfyUI-Manager?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You can use the command line to navigate to the ComfyUI folder, then use git to clone the repository, install the requirements, and start or restart ComfyUI.
questionsAndAnswers.subject: comfy-image-saver

questionsAndAnswers.question: Does comfy-image-saver support autodetection of generation metadata?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, comfy-image-saver supports autodetection of generation metadata, as shown in the provided screenshot.
questionsAndAnswers.subject: comfy-image-saver
